title: Shave procedures in the management of skin lesions where melanoma is a differential diagnosis
details: J Muir, GG Matheus - Australian journal of general practice, 2024
abstract: Background Australia has the world's highest melanoma incidence. Diagnostic aids improve melanoma diagnosis, but most lesions excised on suspicion of being melanoma are benign. Reliance on formal ellipse is common. Objective We explore …
